languages.text: "А ты головой подумай — работать не надо, сидишь себе да на вопросы отвечаешь. Даже блюстители не бьют, так, покрикивают иногда только. Даже жалко, что потом обратно отпустят".
"Use your head — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."
languages.original_text: "А ты головой подумай — работать не надо, сидишь себе да на вопросы отвечаешь. Даже блюстители не бьют, так, покрикивают иногда только. Даже жалко, что потом обратно отпустят".

traits.locale_text: "Use your head, man — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."
"Use your head, man — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."
"Use your head, man — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."
"Use your head — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."
"Use your head — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."

languages.text: “你动动脑子，好好想想。我们根本不用去工作，只要坐在这里回答问题就行了。那些执法者甚至都不能揍我们，他们只是偶尔会对我们大喊大叫。我甚至觉得，等那些人放我们走的时候，我真的会很舍不得。”
languages.original_text: "Use your head — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."

traits.locale_text: “你动动脑子，好好想想。我们根本不用去工作，只要坐在这里回答问题就行了。那些执法者甚至都不能揍我们，他们只是偶尔会对我们大喊大叫。我甚至觉得，等那些人放我们走的时候，我真的会很舍不得。”

languages.text: «Piense un poco: no tenemos que trabajar, solo quedarnos aquí sentados respondiendo a sus preguntas. Los guardias no pueden tocarnos y se limitan a gritarnos de vez en cuando. A mí me parece que hasta lo voy a echar de menos».
languages.original_text: "Use your head — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."

traits.locale_text: «Piense un poco: no tenemos que trabajar, solo quedarnos aquí sentados respondiendo a sus preguntas. Los guardias no pueden tocarnos y se limitan a gritarnos de vez en cuando. A mí me parece que hasta lo voy a echar de menos».

languages.text: 「頭を使え。私たちは働く必要はなく、ただここに座って質問に答えるだけだ。エンフォーサーたちは私たちを殴ることもできないし、たまに怒鳴るだけだ。きっと彼らから解放されたら、私は少し恋しくなるだろうな」
languages.original_text: "Use your head — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."

traits.locale_text: 「頭を使え。私たちは働く必要はなく、ただここに座って質問に答えるだけだ。エンフォーサーたちは私たちを殴ることもできないし、たまに怒鳴るだけだ。きっと彼らから解放されたら、私は少し恋しくなるだろうな」

languages.text: "Denk doch mal nach ... anstatt zu arbeiten, sitzen wir hier und beantworten ein paar Fragen. Die Enforcer dürfen uns nicht mal schlagen. Sie schreien uns nur gelegentlich an. Ich fände es fast schaden, wenn sie uns gehen ließen."
languages.original_text: "Use your head — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."

traits.locale_text: "Denk doch mal nach ... anstatt zu arbeiten, sitzen wir hier und beantworten ein paar Fragen. Die Enforcer dürfen uns nicht mal schlagen. Sie schreien uns nur gelegentlich an. Ich fände es fast schaden, wenn sie uns gehen ließen."

languages.text: « Réfléchis dans ta petite tête... On nous demande pas de travailler, juste de rester plantés là et de répondre aux questions des prévôts. En plus, ils ont même pas le droit de nous cogner, tout ce qu'ils peuvent faire, c'est nous crier dessus de temps en temps. En ce qui me concerne, je suis franchement pas pressé qu'on nous libère. »
languages.original_text: "Use your head — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."

traits.locale_text: « Réfléchis dans ta petite tête... On nous demande pas de travailler, juste de rester plantés là et de répondre aux questions des prévôts. En plus, ils ont même pas le droit de nous cogner, tout ce qu'ils peuvent faire, c'est nous crier dessus de temps en temps. En ce qui me concerne, je suis franchement pas pressé qu'on nous libère. »

languages.text: "Kafanı kullansana. Çalışmamıza gerek yok, burada oturup soru cevaplasak yeter. İnfazcılar artık bize vuramaz bile. Arada sırada bağırdıklarıyla kalırlar. Gitmemize müsaade ettiklerinde ciddi ciddi üzülecek gibiyim."
languages.original_text: "Use your head — we don't have to work, just sit here answering questions. The enforcers can't even hit us, just shout at us once in a while. I think I'll actually be sad when they let us go."
